alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Horry and southeastern Marion Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dongola, or near Conway, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway, Red Hill, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Pee Dee Crossroads, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Dongola, Hammond, Coastal Carolina University, Briarcliffe Acres, Lighthouse Care Center Of Conway, Conway Medical Center and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 7 and 8, and between mile markers 10 and 19. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 19 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern South Carolina.
